scripts.repository:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DockerRepositoryDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.repository:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DockerRepositoryDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.network:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.NetworkDeployer" -c sslCertificateArn=null -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.network:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.NetworkDeployer" -c sslCertificateArn=null -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --force --require-approval never
scripts.database:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DatabaseDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.database:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DatabaseDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --force --require-approval never
scripts.service:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.AECServiceDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 -c springProfile=aws -c dockerRepositoryName=orgwcdevsblogcore-docker-repository -c dockerImageTag=latest --require-approval never --all
scripts.service:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.AECServiceDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 -c springProfile=aws -c dockerRepositoryName=orgwcdevsblogcore-docker-repository -c dockerImageTag=latest --force --require-approval never --all
scripts.deployment-sequencer:deploy: cdk deploy "*" --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DeploymentSequencerDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.deployment-sequencer:destroy: cdk destroy "*" --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DeploymentSequencerDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
